id: Amazon Wants Alexa to Do More Than Just Play Your Music
paragraph:
November 17, 2018 Amazon.com Inc. boasts that Alexa, its artificial-intelligence assistant, can perform more than 50,000 skills.The problem is, most people still use it mainly to turn on the lights, play music or time the pasta.The online retail giant, battling competitors including Alphabet Inc.’s Google for voice-assistant supremacy, is accelerating efforts...
